price: Ва ҳар кас ба андозаи заррае кори бад карда бошад, [кайфари] онро мебинад
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
